column2: I was playing when suddently my head started to hurt and everything aroung me started to swirl around in blue colors.
I heard my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] screaming, when I ran to him he had collapsed on floor with blue light srirling aroung him... magic.
Send [From.GetHerHim] to the Ban Ard's Magic Academy.
The druids should be able to take care of [From.GetFirstName].
A sorcerer should know what to do.
A witch should know what to do.
A druid should know what to do.
Nobody saw anything! I need to think what to do.
